hero.name: Milan Radulovic
hero.title: Senior Frontend Engineer

hero.tagline: Building exceptional digital experiences with precision, performance, and passion.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I'm a Senior Frontend Engineer with {{years}} years of hands-on experience building web applications that actually work — and work well. I've delivered solutions for global companies across entertainment, fintech, and SaaS, always with a focus on clean code, real performance, and great user experience. I work well with international teams, communicate clearly, and genuinely care about the product, not just the code. In my free time, I occasionally fly small aircraft as a hobby — it helps me stay focused and reminds me that precision matters.

highlights.react: React ecosystem mastery — from hooks to performance optimization
highlights.product: Product ownership mindset with end-to-end delivery capability
highlights.performance: Obsessive attention to performance, accessibility, and UX precision
highlights.agile: Strong collaborator in Agile/Scrum teams with excellent communication
highlights.architecture: Solid debugging skills and scalable architecture design
highlights.learning: Rapid adoption of new technologies and industry best practices

achievements.3: Support Product team with technical insights and feature feasibility
achievements.4: Participate in client communications and requirement discussions
achievements.5: Implement complex UI features with focus on performance and accessibility
